languages.text: "Все это — дела прошлые, не будем проливать еще больше крови. Капеллан, позаботьтесь об этой несчастной. Пусть она проживет остаток жизни в мире".
"It's all in the past, let us not spill any more blood. Chaplain, take care of this poor soul. May she live out her days in peace."
languages.original_text: "Все это — дела прошлые, не будем проливать еще больше крови. Капеллан, позаботьтесь об этой несчастной. Пусть она проживет остаток жизни в мире".

traits.locale_text: "It's all in the past, let us not spill any more blood. Chaplain, take care of this poor soul. May she live out her days in peace."
"It's all in the past, let us not spill any more blood. Chaplain, take care of this poor soul. May she live out her days in peace."

"It's all in the past, let us not spill any more blood. Chaplain, take care of this poor soul. May she live out her days in peace."
"It's all in the past, let us not spill any more blood. Chaplain, take care of this poor soul. May she live out her days in peace."

languages.text: “过去的事情都已经过去了，没必要让更多人流血了。牧师，照顾好这个可怜的灵魂，愿她能安度晚年。”
languages.original_text: "It's all in the past, let us not spill any more blood. Chaplain, take care of this poor soul. May she live out her days in peace."

traits.locale_text: “过去的事情都已经过去了，没必要让更多人流血了。牧师，照顾好这个可怜的灵魂，愿她能安度晚年。”

languages.text: «El pasado, pasado está. No hace falta que se derrame más sangre. Capellán, cuide de esta pobre alma. Que viva en paz el resto de sus días».
languages.original_text: "It's all in the past, let us not spill any more blood. Chaplain, take care of this poor soul. May she live out her days in peace."

traits.locale_text: «El pasado, pasado está. No hace falta que se derrame más sangre. Capellán, cuide de esta pobre alma. Que viva en paz el resto de sus días».

languages.text: 「過去のことだ、これ以上血を流すのはやめよう。教戒官、この気の毒なサーヴィターの面倒を見てやってくれ。残りの人生をなるべく平穏に過ごせるようにしてやってほしい」
languages.original_text: "It's all in the past, let us not spill any more blood. Chaplain, take care of this poor soul. May she live out her days in peace."

traits.locale_text: 「過去のことだ、これ以上血を流すのはやめよう。教戒官、この気の毒なサーヴィターの面倒を見てやってくれ。残りの人生をなるべく平穏に過ごせるようにしてやってほしい」

languages.text: "Das ist alles Vergangenheit, lasst uns nicht noch mehr Blut vergießen. Ordenspriester, kümmert Euch um diese arme Seele. Sie soll den Rest ihrer Tage in Frieden verbringen."
languages.original_text: "It's all in the past, let us not spill any more blood. Chaplain, take care of this poor soul. May she live out her days in peace."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist alles Vergangenheit, lasst uns nicht noch mehr Blut vergießen. Ordenspriester, kümmert Euch um diese arme Seele. Sie soll den Rest ihrer Tage in Frieden verbringen."

languages.text: « Le passé est le passé. Inutile de faire couler plus de sang. Chapelain, prenez soin de cette pauvre âme, qu'elle puisse finir sa vie en paix. »
languages.original_text: "It's all in the past, let us not spill any more blood. Chaplain, take care of this poor soul. May she live out her days in peace."

traits.locale_text: « Le passé est le passé. Inutile de faire couler plus de sang. Chapelain, prenez soin de cette pauvre âme, qu'elle puisse finir sa vie en paix. »

languages.text: "Geçmiş geçmişte kaldı, daha fazla kan dökmeyelim. Papaz, bundan böyle bu zavallıyı koruyup kolla. Günlerini huzur içinde geçirsin."
languages.original_text: "It's all in the past, let us not spill any more blood. Chaplain, take care of this poor soul. May she live out her days in peace."

traits.locale_text: "Geçmişte kalan davalar yüzünden daha fazla kan dökmeyelim. Papaz, bu âciz ruhu gözet. Günlerini huzurlu bir şekilde geçirsin."
